properties.entry: SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_WRITER, PRODUCT_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_SCORE FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_WRITER, PRODUCT_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_SCORE ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_CONTENT = ?, REVIEW_SCORE = ? WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
